<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.63

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Runs given statement every frame.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>
In order to keep compatibility between official and community content:
* Since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.57 a stackable version of this EH is available: [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/addMissionEventHandler#EachFrame|EachFrame Mission Event Handler]]
* Before that, the scripted version of the event handler should be used instead (using [[BIS_fnc_addStackedEventHandler]] and [[BIS_fnc_removeStackedEventHandler]]).</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[onEachFrame]] statement

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> statement: [[String]] or [[Code]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[diag_frameNo]], [[diag_fps]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onEachFrame]] { [[hintSilent]] [[str]] [[position]] [[player]]}; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Hints position every frame</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Private variables defined outside of the [[onEachFrame]] scope are not inherited:
<code>_myvar = "bob";
myvar = "bill";
[[onEachFrame]] { [[hintSilent]] [[str]] [_myvar, myvar]; };
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Result: [any,"bill"]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Only one [[onEachFrame]] loop can exist at any time:
<code>[[onEachFrame]] { [[player]] [[sideChat]] "first"; };
[[onEachFrame]] { [[player]] [[sideChat]] "second"; };
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Result: "second", "second", "second"...</value></part></template></code>

Note how "first" never gets shown even though it precedes "second". This is because script thread is executing within the same frame and first [[onEachFrame]] is overwritten before it has a chance to execute its statement.
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Script suspension is not permitted within [[onEachFrame]] scope:
<code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Will throw an error</value></part></template>
[[onEachFrame]] { [[sleep]] 1; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> <code>[[onEachFrame]] {}; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Reset event</value></part></template></code>
</value></part></template>
